Name: Amending the district plan of the Lincoln Square business improvement district to change the method of assessment upon which the district charge is based and authorize additional services for the district.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending the district plan of the Lincoln Square business improvement district to change the method of assessment upon which the district charge is based and authorize additional services for the district

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Finance

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Chapter 5 of title 25 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 25-450.2 to read as follows:
	�25-450.2 Lincoln Square business improvement district; amendment to the district plan. a. The city council having determined, pursuant to subdivision b of section 25-410 of chapter four of this title, that it is in the public interest to authorize additional services for the Lincoln Square business improvement district and to authorize a change in the method of assessment upon which the district charge in the Lincoln Square business improvement district is based, and the council having determined further that the tax and debt limitations prescribed in section 25-412 of chapter four of this title will not be exceeded by such change, there are hereby authorized in the Lincoln Square business improvement district such changes as set forth in the amended district plan required to be filed with the city clerk pursuant to subdivision b of this section.
	b. Immediately upon adoption of this local law, the council shall file with the city clerk the amended district plan setting forth the authorization of additional services and containing the change in the method of assessment authorized by subdivision a of this section.
      � 2. This local law takes effect on July 1, 2026.
